price: 38. Ee ah kuwa ajiiba Rabbigood oo ooga salaadda, xukunkooduna wada tashi yahay dhexdooda, waxaan ku irsaaqnayna wax ka bixiya.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمۡرُهُمۡ شُورَىٰ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
